channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: WGAとスタジオは来週、8月22日以来の労使交渉再開に合意（Jeremy Fuster/The Wrap）
item.description:
Jeremy Fuster / The Wrap:
The WGA and studios agree to resume labor negotiations next week, in a meeting that would be their first since August 22  —  Date for discussions has yet to be determined, AMPTP says  —  The Writers Guild of America and the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers have agreed to resume negotiations next week.

item.title: Hulu、トレンドの映画やテレビ番組を毎日更新する「トップ15トゥデイ」を開始。
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
Hulu launches Top 15 Today, updated daily to list trending movies and TV shows; source: the list uses a formula weighing viewership, popularity surges, and more  —  Hulu is finally getting into the numbers game — but on its own terms.  Vulture has learned that the Disney-owned streamer …

item.title: 情報筋Disneyは、2022年半ばに設定した2024年のDisney+加入者目標を大幅に下回る見込み。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Disney expects to fall far short of its Disney+ subscriber target for 2024, set in mid-2022; its Charter deal will add millions, at a reduced price  —  Walt Disney Co. expects to fall tens of millions of subscribers short of its last publicly stated 2024 target for the Disney+ streaming service …

item.title: マーケティング担当者がキャンペーンを実施・監視するためのAIツールを販売するPixisは、Touring Capitalが主導するシリーズC1で8500万ドルを調達し、資金調達総額は2億900万ドルに達した（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
Pixis, which sells AI tools that help marketers run and monitor campaigns, raised an $85M Series C1 led by Touring Capital, taking its total funding to $209M  —  Pixis, an AI-powered platform for brands to monitor and orchestrate their marketing campaigns, today announced that it raised $85 million …

item.title: 出典：視聴者・広告測定会社のビデオアンプは先週、1億5000万ドルのシリーズGの調達を発表する直前に、従業員の10％にあたる40人以上を解雇した（Axios）。
item.description:
Axios:
Source: audience and ad measurement company VideoAmp laid off ~10% of its workforce last week, or 40+ people, just before announcing raising a $150M Series G  —  Media measurement firm VideoAmp quietly laid off about 10% of its workforce last week, Axios has learned. … VideoAmp now has about 400 employees.

item.title: TikTokとBillboardは、毎週木曜日の朝に更新される、米国でアプリ上で最も人気のある曲を追跡する「TikTok Billboard Top 50 Chart」を発表した（Emma Roth/The Verge）。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
TikTok and Billboard launch the TikTok Billboard Top 50 Chart to track the most popular songs on the app each week in the US, refreshed every Thursday morning  —  TikTok is partnering with Billboard to launch a top 50 chart that tracks the most popular songs on the platform.

item.title: アマゾンがAndroid版プライム・ビデオにIAPを追加し、VODレンタルなどを購入できるようにした。
item.description:
Janko Roettgers / Lowpass:
Amazon adds IAP back to Prime Video for Android, letting users buy VOD rentals and more, after removing IAP from its apps in 2022 to avoid Google's 30% fee  —  Next up: The Kindle app, maybe?  —  Some news from the someone-must-have-struck-a-deal department: Amazon is once again allowing users …

item.title: 米下院公聴会：議員は有料テレビ料金の高騰と停電に不満を表明、業界専門家4人はケーブルと放送のルールは時代遅れと指摘（Matthew Keys/StreamTV Insider）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / StreamTV Insider:
US House hearing: lawmakers expressed frustration over rising pay TV prices and blackouts, and four industry experts called cable and broadcast rules outdated  —  Federal lawmakers this week expressed their frustration over rising cable and satellite television prices and numerous programming blackouts …

item.title: Xのリンダ・ヤカリーノCEOが、元TNTとTBSのGMブレット・ワイツをXのコンテンツ、タレント、ブランド・セールスの責任者に迎えるなど、営業チームを率いるメディア幹部を採用（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
X CEO Linda Yaccarino hires media executives to lead sales teams, including former TNT and TBS GM Brett Weitz as X's head of content, talent, and brand sales  —  Yaccarino also unveiled a new sales leadership team, including former NBCUniversal and Dow Jones executives.

item.title: 情報筋ディズニー、ABCネットワークとテレビ局を、116市場に200のテレビ局を持つネクスター・メディア・グループに売却する方向で協議（Bloomberg）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Disney held talks exploring selling its ABC network and TV stations to Nexstar Media Group, which has 200 owned or partner TV stations in 116 markets  —  Walt Disney Co. has held exploratory talks about selling its ABC network and TV stations to local broadcaster Nexstar Media Group Inc. …

item.title: ジェネレーティブAIスタートアップのMetaphysic社は、同社の新システムが俳優のAI肖像権に関するナビゲートを支援できると主張し、その初期ユーザーにはトム・ハンクスやアン・ハサウェイが含まれると述べている（Carolyn Giardina/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Carolyn Giardina / The Hollywood Reporter:
Generative AI startup Metaphysic claims its new system can help actors navigate AI likeness rights, and says its early users include Tom Hanks and Anne Hathaway  —  The generative AI tech firm announced a new toolset on Thursday and revealed multiple actors who are using its products.

item.title: Automattic、WordPress向けActivityPub 1.0.0をリリース、MastodonのようなアプリでFediverseユーザーがWordPressブログをフォローし、ブログコメントとして返信を受け取れるようにする（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Automattic releases ActivityPub 1.0.0 for WordPress, letting fediverse users follow WordPress blogs on apps like Mastodon and receive replies as blog comments  —  In March, WordPress.com owner Automattic made a commitment to the fediverse — the decentralized social networks that include …

item.title: DAZNが、地元リーグが年間8億ユーロ以上を求めるリーグ・ド・フットボール・プロフェッショネルの放映権入札を計画中。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
DAZN plans to bid for Ligue de Football Professionnel media rights for which the local league is seeking €800M+ per year; source: beIN is also considering a bid  —  - LFP is seeking at least €800 million a year for the rights  — Streaming platforms are spending more on sports rights

item.title: マイクロソフトのニュースサイト「スタート」は、AIが作成したと思われる、文字化けした元NBA選手ブランドン・ハンターの追悼文を掲載した。
item.description:
Victor Tangermann / Futurism:
Microsoft's Start news website published a garbled, seemingly AI-generated obit for former NBA player Brandon Hunter, headlined, “Brandon Hunter useless at 42”  —  Former NBA player Brandon Hunter passed away unexpectedly at the young age of 42 this week, a tragedy that rattled fans …

item.title: ニュースクエスト社によると、2022年の売上高は6％増の1億5,060万ポンド、有料デジタル購読者数は6万5,000人を突破し、広告収入のほぼ50％がデジタル収入となった（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Newsquest reports 2022 revenue up 6% to £150.6M, passing 65K paying digital subscribers, and that almost 50% of its advertising revenue now comes from digital  —  Digital now makes up almost half of ad revenues, and digital subs have surpassed 65,000.
